connect_timeout.description: Maximum wait for connection, in seconds. Zero or not specified means wait indefinitely.

password.description: Password to authenticate with Infoblox server.

pool_connections.description: Maximum number of connections to establish to the Infoblox server. Zero means unlimited.

port.description: Port number used for connection for Infoblox Server.

sslmode.description: If set, Infoblox client will permit unverifiable SSL certificates.

username.description: User to authenticate with Infoblox server.

wapi_version.description: WAPI Version of Infoblox server defaults to v2.7.

dns_view.description: Dns View under which the zone has been created.

ip_addr.description: IP address your instance in cloud.For static allocation ,set this field with valid IP. For dynamic allocation, leave this field empty.

network_view_name.description: Network view name available in Nios server.

tenant_id.description: Unique identifier of your tenant in cloud.

zone.description: Zone under which record has to be created.

alias.description: The alias name for the record.

canonical.description: The Canonical name for the record.

dns_view.description: Dns View under which the zone has been created.

tenant_id.description: Unique identifier of your tenant in cloud.

zone.description: Zone under which record has to be created.

dns_view.description: Dns View under which the zone has been created.

enable_dns.description: flag that defines if the host reocrd is used for DNS or IPAM Purposes.

ip_addr.description: IP address your instance in cloud.For static allocation ,set the field with valid IP. For dynamic allocation, leave this field empty.

mac_addr.description: mac address of your instance in cloud.

tenant_id.description: Unique identifier of your tenant in cloud.

zone.description: Zone under which host record has to be created.

dns_view.description: view in which record has to be created.

zone.description: zone under which record has been created.

cidr.description: The network block in cidr format.

gateway.description: gateway ip address of your network block.By default first IPv4 address is set as gateway address.

network_name.description: The name of your network block.

network_view_name.description: Network view name available in NIOS Server.

reserve_ip.description: The no of IP's you want to reserve.
